extendedInfo.description: My Spending is a free expense management app that helps you to keep an eye on your daily spending.Features:- Save amount, date and details of your expenses.- Assign them to the built-in or to your own categories.- Run spending reports.- Download your data to csv files and attach them to e-mails.Blog:http://spendlite-calcsheetpad.blogspot.com

reviews.title: Best app ever
reviews.comment: You can export files. Has all sorts of functionality in terms of search history. Has really help me get my finances in order and I\'ve been super consistent about using it. Love it, love it, love it!
reviews.author: Deb Conn

reviews.title: Top app
reviews.comment: Awesome app that allows me to record and track my spending. Does what it says on the tin. Wish I could find it for a BlackBerry for my other half !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: This is all you\'re gonna need if you want to record, analyze and ultimately reduce your daily spend on crap you don\'t need. Enjoy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfectly simple!
reviews.comment: I love this app - I can really easily see how I\'m tracking against weekly and monthly budgets and it\'s so easy to enter new expenses that I always do it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just so easy and simple.
reviews.comment: I have been looking for simple way of keeping a list of what I spend, and being able to make notes if necessary, life doesn\'t need to be so complicated this is great thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User
